author: Natasha Lomas
title: EU parliament moves to email voting during COVID-19
description: The European Parliament will temporarily allow electronic voting by email as MEPs are forced to work remotely during the coronavirus crisis. A spokeswoman for the parliament confirmed today that an “alternative electronic voting procedure” has been agree for …
content:
The European Parliament will temporarily allow electronic voting by email as MEPs are forced to work remotely during the coronavirus crisis.
A spokeswoman for the parliament confirmed today that an “alternative electronic voting procedure” has been agree for… [+6870 chars]
